alert.note: Alert for Aiken; Edgefield; Lexington; Saluda (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 30 at 3:55AM EST by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Edgefield, southwestern Lexington, northeastern Aiken and south central Saluda Counties through 445 AM EST... At 354 AM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Edgefield County Airport, or 16 miles northwest of Aiken, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds 30 to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Johnston, Ridge Spring, Edgefield County Airport, Wagener, Pelion, Monetta, Perry, Trenton, Ward, Perry Airport, Lexington County Airport At Pelion, Harmony, Thor, Camp Kinard, Steedman, Kneece, New Holland, Samaria Fire Station and Cedar Pond Campground. This includes Interstate 20 in South Carolina between mile markers 22 and 44. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
